question: Do women start their periods at night?
answer:
QUESTION

Salaam was just wondering if im correct in saying that women start there periods at night???

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatoh

The period will commence when the blood flows to the exterior vagina.This will be confirmed when she sees blood on the blood.The haidh will commence from that time

And Allah knows best

Mufti Imran Hatia
